Question: Asahi Kasei Microdevices Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Asahi Kasei Microdevices Corporation

Product 1: AK581x 60 GHz Millimeter-Wave Radar Transceiver IC

 - Delivers accurate, high-resolution detection
 - Automotive-level reliability
 - Focus on sensing and mixed-signal solutions
 - Applications in Automotive Mobility and HealthTech
 - Automotive audio demonstration
 - Bluetooth low energy transmitter IC for tire pressure monitoring systems
 - Debut at CES 2024
